resources.string: you don\'t have any pokemon in your collection
This app is simulating your phone as pokedex to get the data of wild pokemon. Go to Catch menu and see various pokemon, tap on it to see the description
You can also catch the pokemon by tapping the Catch Now button until you catch the pokemon. The catched pokemon will appear in Home menu as your pokemon collection
You can release your pokemon collection by tap long on selected pokemon and confirm to release the selected pokemon
